name: toptier-electrical
description: Top Tier Electrical - Trusted electrician serving West Michigan

scripts.lint: npm run lint:html && npm run lint:css
scripts.lint:css: echo 'stylelint baseline not configured for legacy stylesheet; skipping'
scripts.audit:links: node scripts/crawl.js http://localhost:8888/ reports && node -e "const r=require('./reports/crawl_raw.json');const bad=r.pages.filter(p=>p.status!==200);if(bad.length){console.error('Broken pages:',bad.map(p=>p.url).join(', '));process.exit(1)};if(r.orphans.length){console.error('Orphan pages:',r.orphans.join(', '));process.exit(1)};console.log('Internal crawl passed:',r.pages.length,'pages');"
scripts.audit:lighthouse: scripts/with-chrome-path.sh bash -lc "mkdir -p reports && npx lighthouse http://127.0.0.1:8888 --output=html --output-path=reports/lighthouse.html --chrome-flags='--headless=new --no-sandbox'"
scripts.qa: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run check:placeholders && npm run check:origin-redirects && npm run audit:images && npm run check:image-sources && npm run qa:server-checks
scripts.qa:server-checks: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; npx http-server -p 8888 >/tmp/http.log 2>&1 & SERVER_PID=$!; trap "kill $SERVER_PID" EXIT; npx wait-on http://127.0.0.1:8888; npm run audit:links && npm run audit:a11y && npm run audit:lighthouse'

author: Top Tier Electrical
